name: Mini Putt (itch)
description:
Mini Putt: Make your way through 9 unique levels!

Features:

  • sand
  • water pools and lakes
  • portals
  • boost pads

Instructions:

  • mouse to aim golf ball
  • click to strike ball with power (power is proportional to distance between mouse and ball)
  • ball must be moving slowly to enter the hole

Stroke: stroke count for current level

Par: average (suggested) no. of strokes for current level

Score: reflects how well you perform the entire game (the lower the better) (score = stroke - par for each level)

If you don't use OS X, you can play the game on your browser:

http://litetj.github.io/mini_putt

Have fun!
